plugins.name: DefaultUser
plugins.body: Support for a "default" flag in users.json.  To get ZeroNet to load a particular user, simply add the pair "default" : to the user's entry in users.json.

plugins.name: SimpleAPI
plugins.body: We provide access to a ZeroNet websocket which exposes the ZeroFrame API commands and two new commands.  SimpleAPI allows you to set the user and site in ZeroFrame API calls.  The two new calls are createNewUser and createNewSite.

plugins.name: LocalStorage
plugins.body: This plugin allows ZeroNet sites to write to a local file that is not seeded.

plugins.name: UserSwitcher
plugins.body: Use this plugin for easy user switching. (Formerly called MultiuserLocal.)
